item.title: Caroline's Personal Bio
item.description: If you are not fully supportive of trans people, or have anything against furries, then leave this site immediately. You are not welcome here, or on my social media! Otherwise, welcome! Feel free to read on! Hi, I’m Caroline! I’m a non-binary trans woman who makes Minecraft mods, professionally tests video games, and (tries) to make them. My pronouns are She/Her, or They/Their/Them. But I’d prefer if you’d just not refer to me indirectly, where possible.
